home.title: Welcome
home.slogan: We print your design on any items

products.title: Products
products.productNotFound: The product you are looking for does not exist.
products.photoEditHelp:
If you choose photo enhancement: we adjust colors and lighting, improve sharpness, remove imperfections, replace the background if needed, smooth skin tones, and make the image cleaner and more professional.

If enhancement isn't needed: we apply only basic fixes to ensure the photo prints well.

delivery.title: Delivery Information
delivery.subtitle: How we deliver your orders
delivery.officeDescription: You can pick up your order from our office at:
delivery.priceText: The price depends on the type and size of the product.
delivery.videoText: Before shipping, we provide you with a video of your order so you can confirm that everything is correct.
